examples.example: 下班之后，我满心欢喜地回家与家人团聚。

translate.english: After getting off work, I go home happily to reunite with my family.

examples.example: 无论在外面经历了什么，我都期盼着早日回家。

translate.english: No matter what I have experienced outside, I am looking forward to going home soon.

examples.example: 春节到了，漂泊在外的游子都纷纷踏上回家的路途，与亲人共度欢乐时光。

translate.english: The Spring Festival is coming, and the wandering travelers who are away from home all embark on the journey home one after another to spend happy time with their relatives.
